verses.verse: To the chief musician. Do not destroy. A Psalm of Asaph. A Song. We have given thanks to You, O God; we have given thanks; for Your name is near; Your wonderful works have been recounted.
When I take the appointed time, I shall judge in uprightness.
The earth and all those living in it are melting away; I set firm its pillars. Selah.
I say to the ones being boastful, Do not boast; and to the wicked ones, Do not lift up the horn.
Do not lift up your horn on high; speaking with a stiff neck.
For exaltations are not from the east, and not from the west, and not from the desert;
but God is the judge; He puts down this one and lifts up this one.
For a cup is in the hand of Jehovah; and the wine foams; it is fully mixed, and He pours out from it; surely all the wicked ones of the earth must drink and drain its dregs.
But I will witness forever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
And I will cut off all the horns of the wicked ones; but the horns of the righteous one shall be lifted up.
